titleStmt.title: Spadacrene Anglica Or, the English spavv-fountaine. Being a briefe treatise of the acide, or tart fountaine in the forest of Knaresborow, in the west-riding of Yorkshire. As also a relation of other medicinall waters in the said forest. By Edmund Deane, Dr. in Physicke, Oxon. dwelling in the city of Yorke.
titleStmt.author: Deane, Edmund, 1582?-1640.

titleStmt.title: Spadacrene Anglica Or, the English spavv-fountaine. Being a briefe treatise of the acide, or tart fountaine in the forest of Knaresborow, in the west-riding of Yorkshire. As also a relation of other medicinall waters in the said forest. By Edmund Deane, Dr. in Physicke, Oxon. dwelling in the city of Yorke.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By M. Flesher] for Iohn Grismand: and are to be sold by Richard Foster, neere the minster gate in Yorke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
